author: Stan Schroeder
title: Instagram launches Co-Watching to make staying at home more bearable
description: Instagram has announced a series of features which should help users stay informed and connected during the coronavirus outbreak. Among the most interesting is a new feature called Co-Watching, which allows users to view Instagram posts together with their fr…
content:
Instagram has announced a series of features which should help users stay informed and connected during the coronavirus outbreak.
